name: Alison Hodgson
text:
Surprisingly good vegan/gluten free options.
I am going through an allergy test diet which has been no fun.  Now that I am adding in food groups I could hit up some Blaze.  I was wary of the gluten free …More

name: A. Julian
text: The pizza is decent for fast food. The seating area was clean. However, the bath room needs to be cleaned asap went to wash my hands and the water seemed to go down slow and a very strange smell was in the washroom. Avoid the washroom if you can.

name: Oswald Cuzco
text: The staff here is absolutely fantastic, every time we've been it's been quick service and everyone is so friendly. The food is always spot on and I can't wait to order again!

name: Phat Boii
text: Thank you to the person who made my $21 total plus $2 tip, into a $29 total today, you're the absolute best <3

name: Azad R
text: Very friendly staff. Delicious pizzas. Reasonable prices. Open till late. Easy choice.

name: James Martin
text: We enjoy going out. Yesterday we  visited this magnificent restaurant which friends told us about. We passed a delightful experience there with fine meal and a nice crew and a distinguished  cuisine. We put this place in our phone list  and we will surely come back very soon. We deeply recommend.

name: Tanya Davis
text: The server rushed the order and left the pizza in the oven too long. It was not a tasty as I hoped.

name: Sandeep Pinjerla
text: Good pizza spot in downtown Evanston. Quick service. Small dine-in spot, best for take out. Restrooms are available. Paid parking along the street.

name: John Carrillo
text: Too slow even though there were no other cuatomers in the store. Went during my lunch break. I waited like 15 just for them to ask me what kind of sauce. Afterwards i was going to tell them what kind of cheese and ingredients i wanted & …More

name: Robert Beets
text: I love this venue a lot. It has a unique mood. The food is wonderful. the service is powerful and the stuff is professional. The price is honest. I warmly recommend.

name: Flavius Strain
text: Good pizza, I’ve only been to this location once and I didn’t expect it to have much seating but there is plenty in the back. Overall good experience.

name: Fizoires Nolan
text: This location is So relevant. The young lady who was wearing a pair of white crocks,  is amazing. I didnt get her name but it was only one wearing crocks tonight. Good job, delicious food friendly service.

name: A L
text: Not enough cheese, burnt crust, guy was a little rude too. Also the smore cookie was drier than a Popeyes biscuit. No thank you.

name: Tif Pepp
text: I love the Evanston location. The staff is awesome and my pizza is always perfect!

name: Patrick Justice
text: Vegan options!! First pizza I've had since going vegan over a year ago. Gotta admit, I almost broke down and loaded it up w/real cheese, but the vegan cheese wasnt bad. I'll probably omit it next time because I think it would be just fine without it. Thanks blaze!

name: Bhavik Mehta
text: the ability to customize the pizza was great

name: Jim Johnson
text: Great experience staff friendly clean in dining ares and behind the counter. Most importantly pizza wasn't over cooked nor under cooked and my pizza was actual served warm not like their other location located on Belmont near the red/brown …More

name: Julie Harris
text: Delicious and great price!

name: Kaitlyn Burnett
text:
Nice place. Good food. Better than mod pizza.

One tip would be to have staff change gloves when they go from handling equipment/touching clothing, to preparing pizza. Some staff seemed to do so, but a couple didn't.

name: Sabona
text: Great food. Nothing wrong with my visit.

name: Luna Mitchell
text: Great staff, the Gm seems to always have things  in order. Amazing pizzas with a great range of variety on both crust and toppings, the build your own concept makes all the difference.

name: Darren Kirby
text: Great made to order pizza.  It was my first visit of many more in the future!

name: Ivaylo Guenkov
text: They always whip away the pizza before you're done talking. Had to say extra cheese twice and they just sprinkled a useless amount and then turn away fast on purpose so you dont ask them to do more to the pizza. Happened 3/3 times and the …More

name: Auxiliadora Rivera
text: Love the quick service! I like how I can customize my pizza and how delicious it comes out of the fire brick oven. It's great for when you're in a rush to grab something good to eat.

name: Alex Tanasescu
text: My favourite place to eat pizza in Chicago! They should open more locations!

name: Hazel Zoleta
text: The keto pizza was good.  My only complaint is that I feel it takes way too long to get the pizza.  I don't think it's the workers fault but they need a better more efficient system.  Also it sucks that if I do take out I need a credit card or delivery.  I would prefer a PayPal system if not pay cash.

name: david
text: Decent enough for modern fast food pizza. There's better pizza in town if you want real pizza.

name: Yash Jain
text: Friendly staff, they were about to close for new years eve. However, served me for an to-go order and it was delicious.

name: j c
text: Quality thin crust bad boys with a wife variety of toppings, cheeses and sauces available. Great value!

name: Rhett Hoskinson
text: Wow, so good. I miss the taste of this pizza in my mouth. Does it still think about me? No, for real though, quality grub and they did our film set a solid.

name: Oliver Leopold
text: Blaze Pizza in Evanston is  a great concept, and wildly liked, but I've been having a couple of issues. The service is incredibly slow. When I came in the other day, I waited about three minutes to first be asked what I'd like, and then …More

name: Meli Aquino
text: I love this place. I've been coming ever since they opened. They have Vegan cheese and Gluten free dough! Download the app to earn points to redeem 1 free pizza/1 free drink or dessert!

name: Adiel Nissanian
text: Went there after a night of drinking but no amount of alcohol will improve the flavor. Very nice staff though.

name: George Kuhnen
text: First time here... There pizza is awesome! Love the donuts too! Good choice of juices!

name: Stephen Watkins
text: It's fine. Nothing less and nothing more. Just consistently mediocre. Service is hit-or-miss, but generally okay. Atmosphere is just bad. Also, the fountain beverages are really, really bad, almost as though they're goading you into springing for a bottle. s m h

name: Matthew Wallace
text: I used to eat here every other day when I lived in the city.

name: Daniel Prusaitis
text: Pizza without white flour:  SO great! Amazing toppings. Uncomfortable seats.

name: Nick
text: Found a cooked band-aid in my food after chewing on it. So disgusting. Do not eat here!

name: Dear Child
text: I love pizza! I love it even more when I can make my own, with as many toppings as I want, and have no extra charge!  One size, as many toppings as you want, no extra charge.  Plus it's cooked fast.  The downside is its always crowded!

name: Juerrette Thomas
text: Both of my pizzas were burnt on the bottom. I only went there due to having tried out the one in Evanston, IL., which was great. Oh well, my salad was divine!

name: martica davis
text: Today is my third and final visit to this Blaze location. On my last visit, I noticed there was quite a problem with fruitflies/gnats in the restaurant. I can't believe that the problem still persists! NASTY! The issue is clearly the …More

name: Zhang Fanyu
text: Rubbish. Rubbish pizza. Small and poor ingredient for the pizza. No salad menu so you can only random select.

text: One of the best pizza I've ever had

name: Luis Reyes
text: Really good pizza. Great staff great service.

name: Vj Rand
text: It's quick and they ask for your feedback before your pie goes in the oven.

name: Tim Egan
text: Great pizza especially if you get it with the slightly burnt edges!

name: Ed Stone
text: 3 & 1/2. I work delivery and there pleasant and quick

name: Peter Conway
text:
Great pizza!

Never ready at time promised, though

name: Chelsea Sherlock
text: High quality ingredients and the pizzas cook in 5 minutes! My favorite when I'm getting pizza for 1 or 2.

name: Peter Andreadis
text: Not as good as my regular Blaze (on Sheridan near Loyola station). Always seem like they are not ready to handle the rush they get. There's never dough ready to go. And last time they put my brother in law's pizza in a box and gave it to someone, when we were waiting to eat in. Still, the food is good, and it's still Blaze.

name: Ayush Krishnamoorti
text: Best fast food pizza you can get in Evanston; they are personal size 11' pizzas that one person can easily have, and are custom-made

name: Kevin Durnbaugh
text: I like the way you can choose your toppings, and the fruit juices/lemonades are delicious. Also beer and wine are available and reasonably priced. Everyone here is friendly, good service, and outdoor seating in the summer. Give it a try!

name: Crystal Thomas
text: 1 of my favorite places to grab a quick lunch Downtown Evanston. Always a good experience, good customer service.

name: parth desai
text: Nice thin crust pizzas. Not very expensive. Very tasty

name: Leslie Lozada
text: They have amazing service there! And the food is awesome!

name: Bijan M
text: The keto crust is great

name: Jeff Miller
text: Just like the Chipotle of pizza. Great idea and you can tell why these restaurants are popping up everywhere. Fast service even when the line is long. The workers are very helpful. Good prices.

name: Bharati Doshi
text: Love blaze pizza !

name: Nina Odedina
text: Horrible service....deserve no stars .As soon as I walk in the door with my two sisters and my daughter,  the manager (short African American male with short dread locks)interrupted our conversation with an extremely rude remark. When I …More

text: Great thincrust pizza place

name: Diana Rodriguez
text: Great GF pizza!

name: Luke L
text: Kind service and good pizza for the speed at which it's made

name: Ben Volkmann
text: Great friendly crew and toasty warm pizza fresh out of the oven. It's amazing how fast it is. Will be back again. It's a great deal for all you want toppings on a personal size pizza.

text: Cooking Togo  very slow

name: Peter Craig

name: GlossY Magnoli
text: I have never had Blaze's Pizza, I've always gotten their salads, which are fresh! You can build your own & add as many items as you like at no extra cost. I love that! I always get the entre or the small & pay between $6-$8+. …More

name: Ravindra Kempaiah
text: As usual, great pizza. I have tried the Maryland locations but it was just as good here as well. Blaze is really making a difference many college towns.

name: Danette Reeves
text: Ridiculous. Just...oh geez, I can’t even. EAT HERE!

name: John
text: The pizza and service was great. Good food for a reasonable price.

name: paige m. sullivan
text: Pizza exactly how I want it, and a SUPER friendly staff

name: Matthew Villaume

name: V. G.
text: This place is great. So cheap and good, and the manager is very attentive. Someone always comes by to make sure that everything is going well.

name: Soumik Chaki
text: Best pizza within budget price.

name: Preston Zifko
text: Service depends on how busy it is, and it's crazy busy at peak hours. Workers work hard but get overwhelmed when the line is out the door. But good at off-peak times

name: Sneha Kumari
text: Building your own pizza is just perfect when you want to have pizza but about the unhealthy factor attracted to it! Their crust is not as crispy as new York style pizza but still thin and thus it doesn't feel bloated after having it. They are really quick considering the fact that everything is done in front of your eyes!

name: Kyle J. Reeves
text: Eat here. Just do it. You will thank me.

text: great fresh pizza, very quick and reasonably priced

text: i love blaze. you can get any toppings you want for one low price. go-to dinner when i'm low on money. enough food for 2 to share one pizza

text: Blaze is an amazing pizza place. Good menu of options, plus the option to create your own. Atmosphere is good, but the amount of seating is lacking.

name: Lisa Horn
text: I came in during a very busy time last night hoping to use a coupon for a buy on get one free that I had a code for.  I placed my order through the app more than a hour before I came in to pick up my pizzas and still had to wait twenty …More

name: David Hong
text: Can get overcrowded, but they're consistent and the restaurant is generally pretty clean. There are nicer blaze pizzas out there, but you can't really beat this location if you're a student

name: Corina James
text: Great location. Good pizza. While I agree it's crazy when busy, I don't blame the staff at all and don't think they lack customer service during these times like some say. They simply need to move fast to accomadate to the customer traffic. …More

name: Bryan Lau
text: Fast, delicious, thin crust pizza at a great price!

name: Jeffrey Cohen
text: Delicious pizza and salad, but left me with a stomach ache.

name: Natasha Kinder
text: Love Blaze Pizza. This location seems to always have a bottleneck at the register. The staff is very friendly and you get the traditional Blaze experience.

name: MzCherryDee

name: Edward Witt
text: I am a huge fan of Blaze pizza and have been to two or three other locations in the greater Chicago area. This one is just okay. The last time I was here my pizza was a bit too burnt because the guy manning the pizza oven was busy goofing …More

text: Crispy and tasty, quick service and good ingredients, unfortunately slightly charred though.

name: Robert Qualls

text: You can't beat the price for what you get! This Blaze Pizza was pretty packed when I went during lunch time but the staff was excellent and got us through the line fairly quickly.

name: B Baldwin
text: Excellent food.

name: Sumedha Goel
text: Make your own pizza is a good concept, but Blaze is always underbaked. And the cheese is falling off. The dough/crust is very thin, and the sauce just doesn't taste good! Much better pizza options in the area - Lou's, Giordano's... and if you want something as cheap: Gigio's!

name: Nicholas Stone
text: If you want a really good, super-thin-crust pizza with fresh ingredients, but don't have a lot of time to wait around while a fresh pizza is made, come here and you almost certainly won't be disappointed (unless you happen to be incredibly …More
